scripts.deployment: pnpm bootstrap && pnpm -r --parallel --stream --no-bail run --filter website --filter docs-website deployment
scripts.bootstrap: pnpm install-doppler && pnpm --filter db gen && pnpm --filter fumadocs-root build:pnpm
scripts.ci: pnpm --filter db gen && pnpm --filter fumadocs-root build:pnpm && pnpm --filter './*' build
scripts.release: doppler run -c production --command 'pnpm --filter db get-diff' && git checkout main && git merge preview && git push && git checkout preview
